org.odftoolkit.simple.table
Interface CellValueAdapter

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultCellValueAdapter
public interface CellValueAdapter

This interface supplies a method which can adapt string content to a more proper cell value type as need. This a very useful function in Cell.setDisplayText and table cell text replacement. For example, if a table cell would be replaced with string "1234" in text navigation, the cell value type can be adapted to "float" automatically with the help of CellValueAdapter.
Different adapter realizations have different adaptive rules.

Since:
0.3
See Also:
Cell.setDisplayText(java.lang.String, org.odftoolkit.simple.table.CellValueAdapter), CellSelection
